text: Hajj ke mahine sabko maloom hain , jo shaks in muqakkar mahino mein hajj ki niyat karey, usey khabardaar rehna chahiye ke hajj ke dauran mein ussey koi shehwani fail (sexual indulgence) , koi badh amali, koi ladayi jhagde ki baat sarzad na ho aur jo neik kaam tum karoge woh Allah ke ilm mein hoga. Safar e hajj ke liye zaad e raah (provisions) saath le jao, aur sabse behtar zaad e raah(provisions) parheizgaari hai, pas aey hosh-mandon! Meri nafarmani se parheiz karo
